Latest.Author: (github-actions[bot])
Latest.Description:
## Changes

## üöÄ Features

- feat: move shareable policies out of experimental @olblak (#1973)
- feat: Allow to enable/disable working branch for all scm plugins @olblak (#1955)
- feat: Add conditional Target @olblak (#1962)
- feat: add flux autodiscovery plugin @olblak (#1950)
- feat: golang autodiscovery should follow conventional commits @olblak (#1947)
- feat: fleet autodiscovery should follow conventionnal commits @olblak (#1946)

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- fix(dockerdigest): Allow to specify none linux os @olblak (#1981)
- fix(golang): autodiscovery should run go mod tidy from sub folders @olblak (#1957)
- fix(helm): ignore containers when tag or repository are not specified @olblak (#1956)

## üß∞ Maintenance

- deps: bump Golang version to 1.22.1 @updateclibot (#1971)
- Update Golang module golang.org/x/oauth2 @updateclibot (#1976)
- Update Golang module github.com/stretchr/testify @updateclibot (#1969)
- refactor: remove useless git checkout after a git clone @olblak (#1966)
- Update Golang module github.com/hashicorp/hcl/v2 @updateclibot (#1967)
- chore(deps): Bump actions/add-to-project from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 @dependabot (#1961)
- Update Golang module github.com/drone/go-scm @updateclibot (#1953)
- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.14.1 to 3.14.2 @dependabot (#1952)
- Update Golang module golang.org/x/mod @updateclibot (#1944)
- clean: always run fleet autodiscovery test @olblak (#1948)
- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.14.0 to 3.14.1 @dependabot (#1934)

## Contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @olblak, @updateclibot and @updateclibot[bot]

Latest.Name: v0.74.0

Changelog.Author: (github-actions[bot])
Changelog.Description:
## Changes

## üöÄ Features

- Add Cargo package autodiscovery @loispostula (#1094)
- Add `spec.files` for Condition and Target of `kind` `yaml` @lemeurherve (#650)
- Add Git Branch resource @olblak (#1000)
- Add NPM autodiscovery @olblak (#1065)
- Allow to define `changedif` behavior for the shell resource @olblak (#1071)
- Expose `workdir` parameter to shell resource @olblak (#1112)
- Support for npm private registry @loispostula (#1093)

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fix cargo autodiscovery test @olblak (#1140)
- Add the ability to use source in commit message @olblak (#1132)
- fix(Git Tag) target should not fail due to "no updated files" @olblak (#1127)
- Provide current workingDir information to shell resource changedif @olblak (#1124)
- Fix autodiscovery jsonschema @olblak (#1108)
- Shell command works for complex command  @olblak (#1067)

## üß∞ Maintenance

- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.11.0 to 3.11.1 @dependabot (#1144)
- [updatecli] Bump Golang version to 1.19.5 @updateclibot (#1135)
- chore(deps): Bump anchore/sbom-action from 0.13.2 to 0.13.3 @dependabot (#1117)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/drone/go-scm from 1.28.0 to 1.28.1 @dependabot (#1121)
- chore(deps): Bump gopkg.in/ini.v1 from 1.66.4 to 1.67.0 @dependabot (#1122)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/google/go-containerregistry from 0.12.1 to 0.13.0 @dependabot (#1123)
- chore: add debug logs for XML resource (condition and target) @lemeurherve (#1119)
- chore(deps): Bump tibdex/github-app-token from 1.7 to 1.8 @dependabot (#1116)
- chore(deps): Bump anchore/sbom-action from 0.13.1 to 0.13.2 @dependabot (#1114)
- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.10.3 to 3.11.0 @dependabot (#1105)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/fatih/color from 1.13.0 to 1.14.1 @dependabot (#1110)
- chore(deps): Bump updatecli/updatecli-action from 2.18.0 to 2.19.0 @dependabot (#1106)

## üìù Documentation

- adopters: add Elastic @v1v (#1141)

## Contributors

@codesee-maps, @codesee-maps[bot], @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @lemeurherve, @loispostula, @olblak, @updateclibot, @updateclibot[bot] and @v1v
Changelog.DescriptionHTML:
Changes

üöÄ Features

  • Add Cargo package autodiscovery @loispostula (#1094)
  • Add spec.files for Condition and Target of kind yaml @lemeurherve (#650)
  • Add Git Branch resource @olblak (#1000)
  • Add NPM autodiscovery @olblak (#1065)
  • Allow to define changedif behavior for the shell resource @olblak (#1071)
  • Expose workdir parameter to shell resource @olblak (#1112)
  • Support for npm private registry @loispostula (#1093)

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fix cargo autodiscovery test @olblak (#1140)
  • Add the ability to use source in commit message @olblak (#1132)
  • fix(Git Tag) target should not fail due to "no updated files" @olblak (#1127)
  • Provide current workingDir information to shell resource changedif @olblak (#1124)
  • Fix autodiscovery jsonschema @olblak (#1108)
  • Shell command works for complex command @olblak (#1067)

üß∞ Maintenance

  • chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.11.0 to 3.11.1 @dependabot (#1144)

  • chore: add debug logs for XML resource (condition and target) @lemeurherve (#1119)
  • chore(deps): Bump tibdex/github-app-token from 1.7 to 1.8 @dependabot (#1116)
  • chore(deps): Bump anchore/sbom-action from 0.13.1 to 0.13.2 @dependabot (#1114)
  • chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.10.3 to 3.11.0 @dependabot (#1105)
  • chore(deps): Bump github.com/fatih/color from 1.13.0 to 1.14.1 @dependabot (#1110)
  • chore(deps): Bump updatecli/updatecli-action from 2.18.0 to 2.19.0 @dependabot (#1106)

üìù Documentation
